backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, contact management, invite code generation, RSVP submission, and access control with authorization checks for all operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (username search, invite links, QR code generation/scanning, contacts list, UI design) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files with their key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining warm earth tone color system using OKLCH values for light and dark modes with custom variables for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Quick Contacts application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup, authentication flow via Internet Identity, profile setup modal trigger, and theme provider wrapping all routes.
frontend/src/components/ContactCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying individual contact information (name, email, phone) with icons and warm earth tone styling.
frontend/src/components/ContactsList.tsx: Contacts list component fetching and displaying all user contacts with loading skeletons, empty state with hero image, and contact count header.
frontend/src/components/InviteLinks.tsx: React component for generating and accepting invite links/codes, with UI for copying invite URLs and a form to accept invites from URL parameters or manual input.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header showing app branding and user profile, navigation tabs for Contacts/Search/Invite/Scan, theme toggle, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for username creation and cannot be dismissed until completed.
Component that generates a QR code from an invite code using the qrcode.js CDN library and provides download functionality for the generated image.
frontend/src/components/QRScanner.tsx: QR code scanner component using camera access that detects invite codes from QR codes and automatically accepts invites, with camera switching and error handling.
frontend/src/components/SearchContacts.t: Search interface for finding users by Principal ID and adding them as contacts, with validation and error handling for invalid principals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend operations including user profiles, contacts management, user search, and invite code generation/acceptance.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm earth-tone color scheme (terracotta, sage, cream) for light and dark modes, plus gradient utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsListPage.tsx: Page component displaying a list of user contacts with header and description.
frontend/src/pages/InviteLinksPage.tsx: Tabbed page for generating and sharing invite links or QR codes, with separate views for each sharing method.
frontend/src/pages/QRScannerPage.tsx: Page component that displays a QR code scanner interface for adding contacts by scanning their QR codes.
frontend/src/pages/SearchContactsPage.ts: Page component for searching and adding contacts by principal ID with a search interface.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom earth-tone colors (terracotta, sage, cream), OKLCH color system, custom border radii, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file for a contact management app with invite links, QR codes, and username search. Tracks existing features (username search, invite links, QR generation/scanning, contacts list, UI design) and pending backend features (user registry, invite link generation, contact management system).
